TRANSACTION.TITLE: 7609 本日轧账(凭证)

    "T(7609                         本日轧账<凭证>)"/>
  

  

  

  

  

  

  
  
  

  

  
  "{
        dim @tota as string;
        dim @f as file;
        dim @filename as string;
	@tota='';
	@f='';
	@filename='本日轧账[凭证]';
    commsend_001();
	$FD91=#TLRNO;
	$TXNO='5609';
	@tota=callserver();
	if($FD12!='0000')
	{
		showmsg(geterror());
		return(false);
	}
	savefiletxt('../tmp/本日轧账[凭证]['+$TLRNO+']',@tota);
	call('fview ../tmp/本日轧账[凭证]['+$TLRNO+']');
	
  }"
